title: Avoiding Shame-Based Parenting, Part 1
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: Even if you have to punish them, your children should still know you love them. John and Danny give practical tips on making sure your children feel loved. Featuring Dr. Kelly Flanagan.
description: Even if you have to punish them, your children should still know you love them. John and Danny give practical tips on making sure your children feel loved. Featuring Dr. Kelly Flanagan.
